00040 {

00042    polarimeter_id  = -1;

00065 void MseFillPolarNewX::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00066 {
00067    fprintf(f, "$rc['fill']                    = %d;\n", fill           );
00068    fprintf(f, "$rc['polarimeter_id']          = %d;\n", (int) polarimeter_id );
00069    fprintf(f, "$rc['ring_id']                 = %d;\n", (int) ring_id        );
00070    //fprintf(f, "$rc['start_time']              = %d;\n", start_time     );
00071    fprintf(f, "$rc['type']                    = %d;\n", type           );
00072    fprintf(f, "$rc['beam_energy']             = %f;\n", beam_energy    );
00073    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar']                   = %f;\n", polar          );
00074    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_err']               = %f;\n", polar_err      );
00075    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_p0']                = %f;\n", polar_p0       );
00076    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_p0_err']            = %f;\n", polar_p0_err   );
00077    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_slope']             = %f;\n", polar_slope    );
00078    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_slope_err']         = %f;\n", polar_slope_err);
00079    fprintf(f, "\n");
00080 }

00084 void MseFillPolarNewX::SetValues(const AnaFillResult &afr)
00085 {
00086    fill        = afr.GetFillId();
00087    start_time  = mysqlpp::DateTime(afr.GetLumiOnTime());
00088    type        = afr.GetFillType();
00089    beam_energy = afr.GetFlattopEnergy();
00090 }

00094 void MseFillPolarNewX::SetValuesPC(const AnaFillResult &afr, EPolarimeterId polId)
00095 {
00096    SetValues(afr);
00097 
00098    polarimeter_id = polId;
00099    ring_id        = RunConfig::GetRingId(polId);
00100 
00101    ValErrPair ve;
00102 
00103    ve = afr.GetPCPolar(polId);
00104    polar     = ve.first;
00105    polar_err = ve.second;
00106 
00107    ve = afr.GetPCPolarP0(polId);
00108    polar_p0     = ve.first;
00109    polar_p0_err = ve.second;
00110 
00111    ve = afr.GetPCPolarSlope(polId);
00112    polar_slope     = ve.first;
00113    polar_slope_err = ve.second;
00114 }
